name: TACT
description:
TACT utilizes cloud based solutions to transform businesses. We provide consulting, strategy development, collaboration and customization on cloud platforms while at the same time turning information into insights for advanced decision making. We make your business easier by providing latest and best suited technologies. TACT guides you through this transformation by providing end to end consulting and solution on your needs. Stay ahead with our cloud and analytics solutions.
Transform the work methods to reach new heights with cloud and analytics solutions build just for your business. TACT helps businesses in making progress through business specific solutions based on cloud that drive better performance efficiency, data security and cost effectiveness.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 522, 5th Floor, Caddie Commercial Tower, Aerocity, IGI Airport
